com.here.sdk.mapview

Class MapCamera.Orientation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.sdk.mapview.MapCamera.Orientation
  • Enclosing class:
    MapCamera

    public static final class MapCamera.Orientation
extends java.lang.Object

    Represents information on current camera orientation in geodetic coordinate space. This data container is part of a MapCamera.State.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double bearing
      Bearing in degrees, from the true North in clockwise direction.
      double tilt
      Tilt in degrees.

    • Field Detail

      • bearing

        public double bearing

        Bearing in degrees, from the true North in clockwise direction. Bearing axis is perpendicular to the ground and passes through the target coordinate.

      • tilt

        public double tilt

        Tilt in degrees. Tilt axis is parallel to the ground and passes through the target coordinate.
